  • Method Details

    • Initialize

      public void Initialize()
      Will be used to add cards to the deck, does nothing right now.

    • Shuffle

      public void Shuffle()

    • AddBombCard

      public boolean AddBombCard(int bombNum)
      This method adds any number of bomb cards to the deck. Unfortunately we have to hard code a method for each card type because i have no idea how else to do it. It also sets the deck's exploding dog card count to the total number of exploding dog cards in the deck by using the CheckDeckForCardId method. The card ID for bomb cards is 0; Prevents them from being added if they exceed the max deck size.
      Parameters:
      bombNum - number of bomb cards user wants to add
      Returns:
      True if the cards are able to be put into the deck. Cards cannot cannot be put in a deck that doesn't have room.

    • AddShuffleCard

      public boolean AddShuffleCard(int shuffleNum)
      Adds any number of shuffle cards to deck, prevents them from being added if they exceed the max deck size. Shuffle card id is 1.
      Parameters:
      shuffleNum - number of shuffle cards to be added
      Returns:
